product_name: Bose QuietComfort Headphones, Noise Cancelling Over Ear Wireless Bluetooth Headphones, Black
short_description: Take charge of the music and stride along to the beat with Bose QuietComfort noise cancelling headphones. Powerful high-fidelity audio paired with legendary noise cancellation allows you to block everything out but the beat and control what you hear. New custom modes give you the power to adjust noise cancellation based on the moment and the option to turn on Wind Block to tune out breezy environments. Or simply toggle between Quiet and Aware Modes for a quick change when the world calls for it. Black and White Smoke headphones pair with an iconic, comfortable design to bring sound as bold as you. Adjustable EQ puts you in control of tuning your music to your liking, and Spotify Tap starts your listening session at the push of a button. With up to 24 hours of battery life on a single charge, your Bluetooth headphones are ready for any adventure. Multi-point toggle allows you to switch between multiple wireless connections without disconnecting and reconnecting each time. Plug in your optional audio cable to your wireless headphones for use even without a Bluetooth connection. The Bose Music app guides you through setup, lets you personalize settings, and keeps your headphones' software up-to-date while providing you with sound that puts you on top of the world.

product_name: Bose QuietComfort Ultra Headphones, Noise Cancelling Over Ear Wireless Bluetooth Headphones, Black
short_description: Bose QuietComfort Ultra Wireless Noise Cancelling Bluetooth Headphones take everything music makes you feel to new highs. Breakthrough spatial audio makes your music feel more immersive than ever before. And world-class noise cancellation that’s quieter than its predecessors to avoid background noise.  CustomTune technology upgrades your sound even more by analyzing your ear’s shape and adapting the audio performance for personalized sound, shaped to you. Made of quality materials, the QC Ultra open ear headphones have a soft, comfortable fit.

product_name: Bose QuietComfort Ultra Wireless Earbuds, Noise Cancelling Bluetooth Headphones, Black
short_description: Breakthrough spatialized audio, personalized sound, and world-class noise cancelling. Bose QuietComfort Ultra Wireless Earbuds, Noise Cancelling Bluetooth Headphones are the ultimate earbud experience. Tap into a more immersive listening experience that makes your music feel more real than ever before. The QC Ultra Noise Cancelling Earbuds also feature CustomTune technology that adapts the sound to your ear’s unique shape for personalized sound. The QuietComfort Ultra Earbuds will give you the perfect fit with nine combinations of eartip and stability band sizes. Enjoy your favorite music longer with six hours of listening time, and the included case holds up to three additional charges too. Get a strong connection to your paired devices with Advanced Bluetooth 5.3, and the Bose Music App helps you keep track of what you have paired. It also walks you through the setup and helps you customize your controls for the best listening experience.

product_name: Bose Ultra Open Earbuds, Bluetooth Wireless Open Ear Headphones, Black
short_description: To the music lovers with a playlist for every mood and moment, meet your new obsession. Bose reinvented earbuds with OpenAudio technology that combines complete openness to your surroundings with rich, private sound only you can hear. Get your run on, flirt with a stranger, go all day and pause for nothing. Compromise? A word you don’t believe in. And with Bose Immersive Audio, the earbuds don’t just feel good and look good, they bring you closer to your music. Bose Immersive Audio spatializes music so you’re not only listening to the music. You’re in it. Are you ready to change the way you listen?   Designed for all-day wear you’ll put these earbuds on and never want to take them off. The Bose Ultra Open Earbuds feature a flexible joint and a light-as-air-grip — you’ll forget you’re even wearing them. With up to 7 hours of play time (up to 4 hours with Immersive Audio) or up to 48 hours of standby, you’re equipped with the power of long-lasting battery life. Plus, the included charging case provides up to an extra 19.5 hours of play time, making it perfect for on-the-go charging. Simple, satisfying button controls make it super easy to manage your music and switch between stereo and immersive modes. Plus, Auto Volume works like magic to keep your music audible even as the volume of your surroundings change. Just turn it on in the Bose app and move from place to place without needing to adjust a thing. And with an IPX4 environmental rating for water resistance, the Bose Ultra Open Earbuds can handle getting splashed on, dripped on, and sprayed on. Acoustic mesh keeps out moisture and debris, so you can keep on listening.  Indulge in TV time without bothering anyone. Thanks to Bose SimpleSync technology, you can pair your earbuds with Bose soundbars and speakers for a personal TV listening experience with independent volume control.  Now available in Black or White Smoke.

product_name: onn. Wired on-Ear Headphones, Black (New)
short_description:
Jam out! Whether you are working intently at your day job, or settling in for a long day of travel, you'll enjoy the comfortable fit of our On-Ear Headphones. Listen to your favorite content or just pretend to look busy- simply put them onn. and tune everything else out! Groove onn.

We're onn. to something here. We took the hassle out of buying electronics and built a brand that's fresh and simple. With delightful pops of color, finding the right product has never been easier. Say goodbye to stressful decision-making and fear of the electronics aisle. Our mission is simple- to deliver great products and make it easy. Choose onn. and get back to using your brainpower for the important things in life- like pondering the question, "What should I binge watch this weekend?"

product_name: Mpow Kids Headphones with Microphone, Foldable 85/94dB Safe Volume Stereo Adjustable over Ear Headphones for Kids, Girls, Boys, Children, Share Function Wired Kids Headphones for School Tablet
short_description:
🐧Free returns and exchange within 45 days, enjoy a risk-free purchase🐧

MPOW Safe, durable & comfortable CH6S Kids Headphones for girls/boys/school - Protect your kids' hearing while giving them the best musical experience!


❗❗❗Normal over ear headphones for adults without volume limit may damage children' hearing❗❗❗


It can be tempting to give children a pair of hand-me-down grown-up headphones, but that isn’t the best option: Not only are the larger size and increased weight less comfortable for younger kids, but the unregulated loudness levels of most adult headphones can lead to permanent hearing damage, a study published by the CDC states that "hearing loss is the third most common chronic physical condition in the United States", so children need a qualified and comfortable kids headphones more than us. Mpow headphones for kids boys girls teens is specifically designed for children and come with a volume limit of 85/94dB which is recommended by the World Health Organization to protect the vulnerable and sensitive ears of kids even they stay alone.

✅Absolute Safety - RoHS-certified, Made of Food Grade Material, None of the Components on the Headphones Have Sharp Edges and Corners
✅85/94 dB Volume Limit Ensuring Hearing Safety & Simple in-line Controls for Little Ones to Learn and Use
✅HD Stereo Sound & Noise Isolation - Pleasant and Clear Sound with a Nice Balance Between Low and High Notes
✅Built-in Microphone & Clear and Lag-free Voice Pickup - Perfect for Online Courses or Video Chats
✅Easy Audio Share - Especially Helpful when You Have Only One Device to Go Around
✅Adjustable Headband & Comfortable Memory Foam Ear Cushions - Comfortable to Wear, Suitable for Children of Different Ages
✅Super Durable - High-strength and Shatterproof Materials & Durable Tangle Free Audio Cable No Fear of Children Tearing
✅3.5mm Headphones with Wide compatibility - Great for Android, laptops, tablets, computers etc
✅Lightweight, Foldable & Portable, Great for School, Travel or Just Stay at Home, Best Choice of Back to School Gifts

Note:
The audio cable is non-removable, for convenient storage without worry for missing.

🎵Mpow 2 Pack Kids Headphones with Share Splitter - Enjoy Happy Time Together🎵

As more and more schools are using tablets teaching, a pair of headphones is becoming an essential tool for your kids.


🙋Why kids headphones?
Normal headphones for adults without volume limit may damage children' hearing if the volume is turned too loud by mistake❗❗❗ We care about kids' health, so we made these efforts - volume limited of 91dB to protect the vulnerable and sensitive ears of kids even they stay alone.

Whether studying intently at the homework, or settling in for a long day of travel, your kids will enjoy the comfortable fit of our over ear headphones. Listen to the favorite content and share with others make life happier!

product_name: JLab Audio JBuddies Studio On-ear Kids Folding Headphones with Microphone, Volume Safe, Gray & Blue HJKSTUDIORGRYBLU6
short_description: Fits ages 6 years old and up. The Wire cutter's corded headphone pick for older kids and safe listening Comfort for home or school. Style to suit any teen. JLab's Over-Ear Cloud Foam cushions offer ultimate comfort for homework session focus without the rock-star price tag. The smooth-sliding metal adjustments and feather-light build give the long-lasting, all-day comfort kids require. Not to mention they're tested and approved for safe listening for kids with their built in volume-limiter at 85dB. Over ear comfort Over Ear design with comfy Eco Leather Cushions and padded headband offer all-day comfort for all ages, from grade school tykes to teens. Volume safe What would great style be without performance The Buddies offer safe-volume control, with built-in volume regulators, to ensure kids never rock out past 85dB. And each pair is still designed with JLab's high-performance sound standards in mind. Adjust and fold Whenever, wherever: Hook up the tangle free, braided-nylon cord equipped with an in-line mic for taking calls, firing up your tunes, pausing them and controlling the tracks on your mix. The 90 degree jack rocks with all devices and cases. And the compact, adjustable headband fits growing kids from ages 6-16. MUSIC TO-GO Built for everyone who loves to rock & roll, the smooth-sliding metal adjustments and feather-light build are ready to hit the road. The plush circular ear cups rotate 80 degrees and fold up in the palm of your hand so you can bring them wherever life takes you, on or off tour. Compact, adjustable headband fits growing kids from ages 6-16.

product_name: My Little Pony x JLab JBuddies Studio On-Ear Kids Headphones

For the modern cool kid ages 6+

My Little Pony and JLab- this magical collab is for every-pony! Start your day on the right hoof with Izzy, Pipp, and Sunny featured on these fab-u-lous My Little Pony JBuddies headphones. Keep your head in the clouds with JLab’s on-ear Cloud Foam cushions that are perfectly lined with a pattern of six unique Cutie Marks from My Little Pony characters. Not to mention these magical headphones are tested and approved for safe listening for kids with their built-in volume-limiter at 85dB.

product_name: JBL Tune 520BT - Wireless on-ear headphones - Black
short_description: The JBL Tune 520BT headphones stream powerful JBL Pure Bass sound thanks to the latest 5.3 BT technology. Easy to use, these headphones provide up to 57 hours of pure pleasure and an extra 3 hours of battery with just 5 minutes of charge. Download the free JBL Headphones App and customize your sound through the EQ, while Voice Prompts guide you through the headphones features. Manage calls, sound and volume from the earcup, thanks to the convenient button control. If a call comes in while you are watching a video on another device, the JBL Tune 520BT seamlessly switches to your mobile device, so you never miss a call. Lightweight and comfortable even after hours of listening, the JBL Tune 520BT headphones fold flat in your backpack to follow you everywhere.

Manage calls, sound and volume from the earcup, thanks to the convenient button control. If a call comes in while you are watching a video on another device, the JBL Tune 520BT seamlessly switches to your mobile device, so you never miss a call. Lightweight and comfortable even after hours of listening, the JBL Tune 520BT headphones fold flat in your backpack to follow you everywhere.
